phrs.translation: 最后审判日（上帝对人类的）；世界末日

sentences.sentence: Ultimately, though, you have to make your own judgements.
sentences.translation: 但最终，你必须做出自己的判断。

sentences.sentence: I can't bear people who make judgements and label me.
sentences.translation: 我受不了那些对我评头论足、乱贴标签的人。

sentences.sentence: People pass different judgements on him.
